TopicTitle: Ok jeb, outta the way, it's bob's time to shine.

Articles.Content:
And hello there forum dudes, this game sounds promising, so I\'ll just post around here now and then just to have a reputation when we\'ll be fighting alien monster things with out boosters.

14 years old, I\'ve got parents that don\'t allow me to buy anything on the internet, and I like seeing things crash into other things.

Also why do I need to verify that I\'m human everywhere? :|

Also why do I need to verify that I\'m human everywhere? :|

So we know you are not a bot.
You don\'t. It\'s only for the first post.

Welcome to the KSP forums. Happy launching!

Arrr! Captain Millst0ne!

Easier said than done, my ships fly like jeb eating a donut, they don\'t.

More death is required.
